archimate:Folder.name: 7.5.1 Base DAC
archimate:Folder.documentation: The Base DAC provides for authorized community members to access LSST data, to ingest data of their own into the DAC's file-based and DBMS Managed storage. The US DAC relies on resources for worker nodes (batch, virtual-data reconstruction, and kuberntes workers). The US DAC contains DBMS resources that can be written by DAC users. The US references data backbone file stores and data backbone DBMS in a read-only, resource-managed fashion.
